website_summaries.verdict: These shoes dry very quickly, so if you're looking to go from totally submerged to totally dry, these are your best bet.
pros: Water drains from both the top and the bottom of the shoe, which is why they dry so quickly
These also don't retain as much sand as some other brands
They're comfortable for walking as well
cons: Not the most affordable brand on the market, but not super pricey, either

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for neuropathy and balance for water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: Love, love , love these water shoes. I have neuropathy and making an effort to lose weight doing water aerobics but all the jumping and walking/running even in the water was painful and balance was hard to keep in the bare feet. Now that is over!!! The shoes give very excellent support to the foot along with softer shock to the foot. 5lbs gone since I got them. They stay on the foot no slipping off and NO PAIN!!!
customer_reviews.author: VR1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Perfect for water aerobics class
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pair for my Water Aerobics class. I love them right from the start. They are light weight the water flows out faster. The bottoms gave me an extra bounce during class. The size fits perfect I wear a size 7 and I ordered a size 7. Also I ordered another pair in a different color the next day after one day at water class. The other reviews helped me to purchase this pair
customer_reviews.author: Diana HALEY

customer_reviews.title: I bought an 8 in the shoes with the adjustable laces and the fit is perfect. Originally I bought this shoe in a size ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m an 8. I bought an 8 in the shoes with the adjustable laces and the fit is perfect. Originally I bought this shoe in a size 8 but without laces that could be tightened. I had to return those because I felt they might slip off in the water. They were just a tad bit loose and I have wide feet. So if you get a slip on shoe I suggest going down a half size. Over all SO FAR they feel comfortable and I love how they look. I won’t really test them out completely until July during our trip to Maui. I’ll post more then.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Be aware! The material triggered skin reaction
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shoes for my mom. We are in the Caribbean now. 3 days into our trip, she couldn't figure out why she is having skin reaction on top of her feet, no pain, but itchy. The redish rashes are in the area that covered by the top portion of the shoes. The skin is fine outside of the covered area. Obviously it's from the shoe material. A very useful product for the beach, but the material is not safe. I googled it, poor shoe materials can potentially give your rash and it's considering unsafe. Having said that, your skin might be thicker than my mother's... Still, be careful when you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Bob Davis

customer_reviews.title: They won’t hold up don’t waste your money. Do not listen to the other reviews. They’re all lying
customer_reviews.text: The reviews on this site must be fake. The material is cheap, and made poor. It took me one minute to realize that these shoes would fall apart within a minute of wearing them. I’m sure the reviews were paid to be on there. The soles are sewn in poorly, if the insert comes out, and it will because it’s just placed inside the shoe you would be stepping on a hard plastic like material. I am so disappointed after reading all of the reviews thinking I would be buying a good water shoe only to find out I’ve been scammed into buying absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C. Gelzinis

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I am in water aerobics classes every day. These shoes support without binding and fit snug enough that my foot feels secure. The sole of the shoe does not slip on the bottom of the pool. They drain well and the upper is mesh to facilitate drying. They run rue to size so I bought my actual shoe size and they fit great. Since writing this review I have continued to enjoy these shoes for Water Aerobics. I just purchased a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: Wore these during my climb up Dunn River Falls in Jamaica!!! They were comfy, stayed on my feet, and didn't slip once! Wore them the whole 8 hour trip without problems. Got several compliments on them cause anyone that's seen water shoes knows they can be pretty ugly and these were particularly cute. I also have really wide feet and had no problem with them fitting. Very stretchy. Loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for sandy and rock beach vacations
customer_reviews.text: Fit is not the problem. These water shoes were not the best. Sand, rocks and slithering bugs can easily get into the shoe through all the holes. The constant removal of these shoes to rinse out rocks and sand on my vacation made me regret the purchase. I should have gotten glove like shoes to protect my feet. These were no different than the flip flops I was trying to avoid wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Mahmoud E.

customer_reviews.title: Sellers not honest-Shoes fine
customer_reviews.text: The sellers said to write a good review, take a snapshot, send it to them and they'd send another pair of shoes. I did this twice and they did not send another pair of shoes. As far as the shoes go. I liked them. They are wearing out now, but I have worn them a lot. The black strips on the bottom have come loose. I bought another pair just like them from another seller. I love these shoes as a quick pull on shoe and they are nice wet or dry.
customer_reviews.author: Cherley Grogg

customer_reviews.title: A size up is too big.
customer_reviews.text: I like these water shoes. They are really light weight and I think very fashionable. Most review said to order a size up. I wear a 9 so I ordered a 10 and they are too big. I just ordered a size 9 and will compare the fit. I bet the 9 will work but if not, both pairs go back. UPDATE: The size 9 arrived and they fit much better. I wore them in the pool today. They are very comfortable I sent the 10's back.
customer_reviews.author: Book'ems

customer_reviews.title: Ripped heels :(
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cheap, and lightweight, and perfect for kayaking, tidepooling, running or walking on the beach...anything where your feet could get wet. So, I went running on the beach with these, and I have to say the water draining features are great, but the sand wouldn't wash out of the insides at all. I put them in the washer AND dryer, and they came out like new, but kind of sucks I have to wash them each time. Update ** the back of the heel has a big seam and it absolutely ripped my heel up.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Good water shoe, not for sand
customer_reviews.text: Warning: these shoes don't work well in the sand! If you're going to just get wet feet, they're fine. But don't try to use them on the beach!! They collect tons of sand and you can't get it out. Also, they're comfortable around my foot but they have zero support. The insole is very thin... which is good if you are getting water in and out (like kayaking or Stand-up paddle-boarding) but they're not very comfortable to walk in for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after the first day of vacation.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these on our Maui, Hawaii vacation on March 6, 2019, the start of our vacation. I am on vacation until March 16th. But already they have started to fall apart. I am disappointed because they had good reviews and looked well made. I only wear the water shoes for beach and to the pool so I thought they would hold up better they have so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B.

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy for lake/river trips. (fit wasn't great either)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these in men's 13 and woman's 8. The fit was okay, they were almost too big on the men's 13, he had almost an inch of extra rooms and they were a little tight on the woman's 8. Look really nice compared to whats out there but as the other reviews said these are not great for lakes/rivers with sand or small rocks, so that was my bad, I should have looked at different options based on that. 3-stars are for the fit, they didn't fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kells

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Supportive, Dry in No Time
customer_reviews.text: I wondered how different these water shoes could possibly be from my other ones that were wearing out - I was surprised to find out that they are indeed very different from any other water shoes I've ever had. The secret is in the sole; the water drains right out of them; combine that with the mesh lining and you have comfortable, supportive water shoes that are dry in no time! I have a weak ankle and tend to pronate, yet these shoes were light and sturdy enough for me to wear during my water aerobics class. Easy to slip on and off. Definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: SoozeSays

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality & wayyyy Over-Priced
customer_reviews.text: Bottom pieces fell off the first time I wore these. If I wanted to buy throw away shoes I’d of gone to a dollar store. These are crap
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Treker

customer_reviews.title: I really like how these shoes look and they initially felt really ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like how these shoes look and they initially felt really comfortable but unfortunately they are poorly designed. The holes in the bottom of the soles are big enough for things to get stuck in them, such as small pebbles, and they actually poke through and hurt your feet! I had to keep picking the pebbles out of the soles because they hurt. Also, the shoes don't stay on well and I almost lost one in the water because the back of the heel slips off and doesn't hold a shape. Really dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Great Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute color and comfy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the color. Fits nice, I used them for a harbor cleanup that ended up being out in a marsh, so I can’t say if they were necessarily great for water, but they did their job and were very comfortable. I got them completely submerged in yucky marsh muck, and rinsed them off decently. Threw them in the washing machine a couple cycles and they look almost clean!! I’d imagine if it were just sand and dirt water it would have come out 100% clean. I’d say they’re at 80% which is amazing considering they were a dark murky brown/gray/green color. I’d definitely repurchase just to have the bright color restored lol. Attached photo is after washing them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love, love love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes. I brought the white pair and for the 1st time in years my feet didn't hurt after being on them all day. I added memory foam insoles. I got so many complements I ordered the black and blue pair too. They look very stylish. True to size. My sister and 85 y/o mom tried them on and they got on the Amazon website and ordered themselves a pair. A few of my co-workers ordered themselves a pair. My mom has wide feet and she couldn't believe the comfort. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: OliveOily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your next tropical vacation!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a tropical vacation. I hiked to a waterfall in other shoes, but stowed these in my backpack to use while in the waterfall. They were so perfect that my husband was bummed I did not buy him a pair. They are shaped like a tennis shoe, are lightweight, easy to swim in, comfortable to walk distance in, easy to clean sand out of and I found the peach to be a wonderful color. I wear a 7.5 and purchased a 7.5. The laces pull the sides in for my narrow feet to feel comfortable. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Zona

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Mesh on top and bottom, and holes in the soles so sand and water have a place to go and don't bother your foot. They run just a smidge small, however. I wear a size 7 and my toe just touches the tip of the shoe. And while these are great for the beach, they don't make good street-wear. The soles consist of something akin to a tough foam rubber, so it scuffs easily if you have to walk a couple blocks to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Batrav9

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend. Stylish, comfortable, fast drying and no blisters!
customer_reviews.text: There were great for what I needed. I did a trio of canoeing and portaging. 90km of canoeing and 5km of portaging on relatively rough and rocky terrain. And while canoeing through shallow areas I needed to walk through the water and rock. These shows were great for both land and water. I didn’t get one blister either. I had the most stylish shoes compared to every other person on the trip with me lol. The only thing that I didn’t love wasn’t that Little Rock’s got stuck in the holes on the bottom of the shoes and it tore a bit. But I was pretty hard on them. And for the price you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I wore them one time in my aqua zumba class and the black stuff on the bottom is falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Comfy at a waterpark
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a visit to a waterpark, and they were great! Much more comfy than your traditional water shoes that are super flat bottomed. My kids and husband were all jealous, and wanted a pair like mine! I have plantar fasciitis, and these left me without the pain usually associated with walking a ways in totally flat bottomed shoes. One item - check the size. I was initially sent a size too big (the size chart lists what Euro size you should receive, which is unfamiliar to me, being from the US). The seller remedied the situation quickly, and the correct size fit as I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for pools, lakes, water parks
customer_reviews.text: They are a very stylish water shoe. They look like tennis shoes. They wash very well. I've worn them 5 times this summer: River- worked perfectly, even on the trail Pool- worked perfectly Backyard Sprinkler- worked perfectly Chesapeake Bay Beach- DISAPPOINTED, all the little rocks in the sand got caught either in the sole of the shoes or inside the shoes. I spent the next few days removing tiny rocks from the soles of the shoes Ocean Beach- Great if you are just sitting in the sand, terrible if you plan to get in the water. There was so much sand in the bottom of the shoes, I had to take them off
customer_reviews.author: Mr V

customer_reviews.title: Super light-weight
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the lighter-than-air weight of this shoe. True, it's not going to last a long time (I think), but I don't expect it to. I've had much more expensive water walkers, which were a pain to get onto my foot. These are super easy to get on, and yet they feel snug enough around the foot-opening that I'm sure they won't fall off when wet. I ordered these 1/2 size larger than my normal shoe, because of past experience with water shoes which were too hard to pull on. They fit well - and I think that I could have ordered my normal size, but these will be fine (because they are snug around the foot-opening).
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and I wear them as water shoes, or regular sneakers hanging outside. This is my second pair and as long as they're available, I'll keep buying them. You can cut and adjust the laces, and toss them in the washing machine to clean and put in the sun to dry. I took these to bridge jump and they stayed on my feet in the water and helped me get back to the top over rocks and dirt. I also wear them just hanging out front with neighbors. They're stylish, do what they're supposed to, and are super comfy. Can't say enough good things about these shoes. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: This water shoes comes in to brands "Socone"  and  "Aleader"
customer_reviews.text: Three differences: 1: Zhuanglin Socone is cheaper. 2: Zhuanglin Socone comes two sizes smaller than your size, if you are 7.5 you have to order 8.5. Now, the white color it's one size smaller than yours, if you are 7.5 you have to order 8. Aleader its true to your size. 3: Inside of Socone brand, the piece of fabric where you rest your foot its no attach to the shoe, so what I did is glue it with clear silicone. To me, both brands are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: C.J.

customer_reviews.title: Very slightly on the smaller side but still fit.
customer_reviews.text: I often wear a 6-1/2 rather than a 6, but I thought that because I wouldn’t be wearing these with socks that a 6 might be best. They may be close to true size, but they’re rather snug on my feet though thankfully not so much so that I plan to return them. Already used them in my aqua fit class twice, and they worked out just fine. Changing my review to two stars because barely over a year after purchasing these and only using them only about 3 times per week for a total of about 7 months, they’re starting to fall apart and will need to be replaced. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi

customer_reviews.title: Did the job but...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a couple of different sizes until I got the right fit. They worked really well in water and protected my feet. The ankle fasteners worked great and they stayed on my feet. Rocks and pebbles got stuck in the soles and I had to pry them out. The material glued to the inside of one of the toe boxes came apart. I needed to return them.
customer_reviews.author: GreenEyes

customer_reviews.title: Cute color, works well!
customer_reviews.text: I was quite happy with this purchase! The aqua color looks just as vibrant and lovely in person as it does in the images, and the fit is perfect. Plus, they're easy to get on and off even when wet. The only issue I found with it was that the seam on the heel was scratchy, and I ended up with a small amount of skin missing by the end of my wear (luckily over calluses, so just surface tear). All said and done I would absolutely buy these again...and maybe just figure a way to remove or cover the scratchiness on the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and dry well, but sometimes trap smaller rocks underneath.
customer_reviews.text: Loved these shoes. I wore them for camping/ hiking to the river. I ended up forgetting my running shoes and used them for running the trails as well. They were comfortable and supportive (I wore them with socks while running), even running. The only negative is that the holes at the bottom are perfect for trapping little stones/ acorns. I had to stop quite a few times while running to pluck out the rocks, as you could feel them. I’m not sure I would use these for hiking in a rocky riverbed, but other than that I will definitely use them again. They were extremely comfortable and they were a perfect back up to not having my running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Cute (loose fitting) shoes, shoestring clamp does not work. 😑
customer_reviews.text: While I really like the look of these water shoes, very sporty, they do fit/feel wide. I like that they have the adjustable shoestrings to tighten the fit a bit; unfortunately, the right shoe string adjuster/clamp (whatever you want to call it) does not work 😑; therefore, the shoe fits extremely loose and I can see it being uncomfortable or falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha K. Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on & take off
customer_reviews.text: Use these during aquacize classes 2x/week. I was a little concerned about getting them on and off, because most of my other water shoes have had either a zipper or elastic laces. No worries; they stretch just enough at the top to pull on to my feet. (I wear a 7M women's shoe, so can't say if someone with a very wide foot would have issues with this.) Seem well made, and the sole has good traction in the pool. I'll probably order another pair soon, though, because I like to rotate my swim shoes as I do swimsuits. (I work out in a public pool that gets heavy doses of chlorine, which is very hard on fabrics.)
customer_reviews.author: divinemsm

customer_reviews.title: Great for what they are
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my cruise and loved them on the beach. They protected my feet from the ground and rocks. Like the other reviews said rocks did get stuck in the bottom but so what, push them out with a pencil later. These shoes were adorable enough for me to wear even when I wasn't going in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Water Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these shoes in the pool for almost two months now (I teach water aerobics from within the pool) and they are perfect. Good support, very comfortable, easy to pull on and off and lots of stability when walking on wet pool decks. I wouldn't hesitate to buy them again or recommend them to anyone who participates in active water classes. I'm taking them with me on a beach vacation soon and I think they will be equally great in that environment.
customer_reviews.author: T. Walters

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Comfort Level on my feet.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order and tried them on today. They feel great! I'll update after I go to the beach! Update:These are comfortable for me. The sand didn't just fall out as I expected though, it accumulated rather, even while walking in dry sand on the beach. Small stones also get wedged in the holes in the bottom and you have to stop pick them until you can get them unstuck. My shoes still need to be dried overnight on the balcony of a hotel room. I dropped to a 4 rating only based on comfort level I experienced with these on. If I was rating for practical I would honestly drop to a 3.
customer_reviews.author: Bratt

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great shows from a company I never heard of. I saw the reviews and tried them. Pros: - Very comfortable - Soft and grippy - Finally my legs are really ventilated from all sides - Will not stink after a long day Cons: - Very soft materials, will not hold for long. - Price Overall, I wish it was a long time runner but it’s not. You will find your self changing them very often. But I look at it like the racing tires, they work great for a short period and you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: LoLa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and oh so worth it
customer_reviews.text: This was a phenomenal purchase. These were purchased for a Colorado trip because we knew we were rafting. These shoes were awesome. Breathable, comfortable and perfect. They didn’t slip, the hiking and walking that was done was impressive for this style shoe. They dried quick and although there was debris on top-sand and rock, nothing ever bothered my feet. If this shoe didn’t have holes in the bottom for the water release I would buy them as a regular sneaker. I also hiked a mountain in them and they were the best shoe. The only con is that they were a little big-could have gone with a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Protection for Heel Surgery
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in PINK for a present for my dad's widow. They were in a motorhome accident & she had surgery on her foot as a result. She needed them for water aerobics to protect her surgery site on her heel. She really likes the fact that they have the adjustable elastic loop because her injured foot is way bigger around due to swelling. She'd asked for ones with a sole & these are perfect for her pool/water rehabilitation protection. She normally wears a size 9 & these (9's) fit perfect. For some reason, they were detained in shipping for a day or so.
customer_reviews.author: FEXY

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect and exactly as described. I had a hard time deciding on a color, but decided on the peach color. and it's true to the color shown online and in others' reviews. I found them true to size in every way, but I suspect they may be a little larger if you have extremely narrow feet, especially in the toe box. They are so easy to slip on and off, are extremely lightweight, and instantly comfortable! No break in required. I haven't tried them in water yet, and wonder how well they will clean if they get dirty, but for the price, it's totally worth a shot.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Functional and light weight, and offers comfort.
customer_reviews.text: purchased these the first time for "house shoes"- fairly comfortable and not hot to wear....then purchased two more pairs for my granddaughters for hiking by the great lakes. Light in weight- functional sole, and fairly easy to slip off and on. Certain colors are less than some, but for the price I paid (less than 20.00), these are far better to walk on rocks with than flip flops, or crocs! I would buy again. If you would want to wear socks (can't imagine why you would), then I'd probably go up a half size. I wear an 8 and they fit perfect with bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoe, very comfortable, a bit wide for a M shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love the water shoe, very comfortable, airy feel, ordering another pair. Slightly wide for medium (M) width label. 9 is a bit long, maybe bc I wear a 9 normally with socks, now going to order an 8.5 but keeping the 9 anyway. Will provide update on if the 8.5 fits better. My foot is narrow but usually a M width shoe is fine, this is a bit wide but with the strings I can tighten easily. The light pair are size 9 and dark gray are the 8.5 that fit better . Orderimg another 8.5 but keeping the 9 since I wore them
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Solved problem of Right shoe great. Left, crumpled toe box.
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful that these would work for me. The right one was great. Then. I put the left one on and found that the crumpled appearing toe box was gouging into my toes. Since its a THIN piece of plastic like you'd find holding a package of cookies, it's SHARP and thin. Can't wear them unless I can manage to cut it out of the shoe. UPDATE: I have solved the problem by grasping the toe piece, which turned out to be fabric, and carefully pulling on it until it was stripped out of each shoe. Now the top of my toes are against the mesh fabric and it is VERY comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get these!! So comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Wore them to Tulum, walked that ENTIRE place, then wore them snorkeling and walking through the forest that same day and then swimming in the pools at the resort. I didn't anticipate them being so comfortable. These were great, rocks got stuck in the treads, but I'd rather there than my foot. The bungee cord makes sure they stayed on my feet, I'd wear these ziplining. They're flexible and slim when packing, and the insoles come out super easy for rinsing or washing. I love these. Tons of compliments when I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Cortni

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not write reviews. I was compelled to because these shoes are great. I ordered a size 10. I am normally a 9.5-10 and I have a wide foot. They came in the mail and I tried them on. They were so comfortable I wore them around the house. I have a bad back and these shoes are so comfortable with a cushion sole. I wear them to the pool and in the locker room showers. They are also a nice looking shoe. Would definitely buy again. I may get another pair!
customer_reviews.author: E. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Be comfortable and have fun!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really comfortable it feels light on the feet! If you don’t like lose shoe the 8.5 isn’t for you , I like extra room in my shoes so I go a bigger size but if you don’t like it then the 7.5 should work out for you! I would walk in them all day long but there good for shot periods of walking, I have used them for rock climbing or anything extreme there good for Cruise! I love them and there cute and comfortable!! so get them!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Amazing water shoes but size up if...
customer_reviews.text: These water shoes are amazing!! My only suggestion is that if you have wide feet or swell in the feet easily I would suggest the next size up. That’s the only thing I noticed could’ve been just a tad better for comfort. Otherwise everything else about these was great. Only the tiniest rocks from the lake could get in them and filtered everything else out. And they lasted the whole weeks worth with no problems. Also they are super cute! I got pink!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for a trip to an island. These were very, very comfortable. My feet didn't sweat, they look just like gym shoes but very lightweight. They are good for the beach especially if the sand turns into small rocks at the surf line. I wore these as gym shoes even when not in the water. Definitely comfortable and great quality. My friend purchased a cheaper version and she had red marks from the tongue on her cheap version. Mine didn't have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: I am between a 10 and 11 so I ordered a 10, knowing I won’t be wearing socks with these. They fit perfectly. Purchased for our trip to Florida in June, knowing we will be there during the rainy season and I hate having wet shoes. Couldn’t beat this price and reviews were great, so I’m adding mine. These seem very comfortable. The only drawback is they seem a little itchy under the drawstring, but that may go away with wear. Hoping these hold up because so far I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Music Mom

customer_reviews.title: He. Rocks get embedded in the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I had mixed feelings about this shoe. I bought these water shoes mainly for something I could wear in & out of water that had support. These shoes are BETTER than the typical cheap water shoes that one could get at a department store. The support is great. It felt like I was bare foot - which I like. It is breathable & quick drying. However they are not good to wear through the dirt/sand especially when wet. The little pebbles from the lake were embedded in the bottom of the shoes after swimming - a total pain to dig out & some of them I couldn't even get out.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Water Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these shoes and that they are easy to slip on and off. Cons were that they had some inner stitching that rubbed against the top of my foot and was very uncomfortable. I had to get in with a small pair of scissors and it was difficult to cut off the bothersome stitching. I also thought the soles were a bit too thin and squishy, not quite as substantial as I would have liked for walking on jagged rocks in the ocean. Overall they did the job, though, and I love the look and color!
customer_reviews.author: Liz R

customer_reviews.title: Best sand n sea shoe..a must have.
customer_reviews.text: The best water shoe we could have ever purchased..! Super on sand, beach, sea, pool and even during rock climbing and trekking in forests, climbing loads of stairs, strenuous hiking activity in scape park.. the water drains out immediately. Need to wash off the sand under tap. Featherlight. Little stones get lodged which can be removed by fingers but these stones/rocks never touch the feet. Feet always protected. A must-have pair for outdoors esp where water or sand is involved. Simply love it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Banerjee

customer_reviews.title: great shoe, bad customer support
customer_reviews.text: First, in general these are great shoes. Unfortunately these seems to be a lack of quality control in the manufacturing process. The first pair I purchased were perfect. The second pair had a manufacturing flaw. The fabric on the inside, at the toe, was not attached to the outer shoe. The fabric folded and created sores on my feet. The seller has not responded to my feedback/request to correct this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Yuck! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I never have stinky shoes, but these are terrible. I have only used them 3 times, rinsed them thoroughly after each use, and they smell horrible!! My friend has a new pair and noticing the same issue! I wish I could return them. Even after washing them and putting dryer sheets in them, the smell is disgusting!! Going in the trash!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Best water shoes out there!
customer_reviews.text: These came on time for my Splish Splash adventure. I wore them the whole time and they were extremely comfy. My friends kept asking if they felt squishy and nasty on the bottom and I kept telling them no because they have holes on the bottom. These are totally worth it and wayy cheaper than the ones from the water park! I would definitely recommend these water shoes to anyone. Oh one more thing, these do run true to size! I was skeptical on ordering a size down as one foot is more swollen than the other. I took my chances and ordered my regular size and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: mahal kiita

customer_reviews.title: Breathable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for an upcoming trip to the beach. I’m diabetic so I have been concerned about stepping on anything that could injure my feet. I LOVE these shoes! First, they are so comfortable that they are now my go to shoes for just about everything. I don’t like any shoe that doesn’t fit securely on my foot so these are a perfect replacement for flip flops because they are so breathable. I love that I can wear them in the water and it just flows right through. I can’t say enough great thing about these shoes. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Chaalugal

customer_reviews.title: Smell toxic, made my feet burn and itch
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely TERRIBLE. They reek like poisonous chemicals and plastic. I had them on for less than 5 minutes and my feet felt burny and itchy from the material. Very poor quality fabric and materials I don't know how these have good reviews
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & Cute
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really comfortable and very cute. I wore them for a beach camping trip and love everything about them except that they will fill with sand if you're walking in dry loose sand. Most people remove their shoes when going through this area but I prefer to keep mine on. They took a 10 day beating and they still look great, defiantly worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: autumn

customer_reviews.title: Better for soft terrain.
customer_reviews.text: I really wish this product worked out for me. I loved its sporty look, how you could adjust the tightness and the overall fit. However the design on the sole was terrible. I wore them to a white water rafting trip and had a horrible time just walking over gravel! Any type of tiny rock got caught in the sole's webbed design. And any space that was not webbed was very thin (I suppose to accommodate for the quick drying) and if I stepped the wrong way on a pebble, it would pierce me on the bottom of my feet. These may be better suited for smooth terrain like the beach, but for something rocky I definitely would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: k. antonette

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Like the look, they are very light. Did great at keeping most sand out and what did get in fell out the bottom. I wore them walking around the pool and beach, not sure if I'd want to walk around town with them as they are not padded, but I may try it later. Did great for pool volleyball. I had a tendency to use them as slippers and they did fine without the back pulled up. I wear a 6 in heels and usually a 7 in tennis shoes with socks. I got a 6.5 as I wear these without socks and they fit perfectly. Not sure how long they'll last, but I'll buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.  The quality isn't very good.
customer_reviews.text: The clasp to keep the strings and shoe tight unfortunately slid down and won't keep the laces tight on one shoe. After a brief walk through my yard and driveway upon arrival. I really needed water shoes that are tied for water rafting. Now I have to buy something else and hope it makes it on time...cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great extra to have for watersports! Saves your feet if you are on unstable or uneven surfaces. Rocks, corral, etc. Drains well because of holes in soles. Can get small stones lodged in bottoms, but can easily be picked out. Worth every penny to have instead of flip flops so you can walk with stability. And not have to constantly be changing shoes or caring extras around. Saved us on our trip in Mexico. My son and husband agreed they were a great purchase (I bought them for all of us). Used kayaking, zip-lining, tubing, cliff jumping, etc. Great product! And they were comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Thompke1

customer_reviews.title: Great for hikes and swimming!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Hiked on vacation and climbed on rocks and trails and swam with them! A little flimsy when dried out after being in salt water, but they looked great and everyone thought they were regular tennis shoes. The soles came out a bit tho, so I had to take them out when rinsing sand out which was a little challenging with the net holes in the top, but that was expected with water shoes. I even wore them white water rafting down a river near my house, which is why I’m surprised they held up after that. Lasted all summer through lots of vacation adventures, and will probably use them again next summer! :))
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our trip to St. John in the USVI where we beach hop and hike to some beaches. I wore these all week and they did great! I got lots of compliments on them. Small rocks get stuck in the bottom holes but they didn’t poke or hurt my feet. I could just feel it as I walked when it would happen so I’d dig them out, no big deal. It didn’t happen often. They dry very quickly and can take a beating of walking and hiking in them. Will buy again when these kick the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Hands down PERFECT for the lake/river/beach
customer_reviews.text: Hands down PERFECT for the lake/river/beach. They actually have a little bit of traction on those slimy rocks! They really do dry quickly and they are comfortable enough to run around in (no more sloppy wet neoprene--yay!!!), and they are as light as a feather! I'm a "wide" and they are snug, but not uncomfortable as they slipped on without a struggle. You don't want them to slip off in the water so snug is good! As for the sand vs. the mesh--a quick shake of the foot in the water and bye-bye sand. These are a GREAT invention. Would DEFINITELY recommend these!!!
customer_reviews.author: CLL

customer_reviews.title: Recommend! Good fit, didn't hold sand, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes for the first time to go shell hunting this weekend. They were great. The bottoms held a small amount of sand, but it wasn't bad as it was on the sole not inside the shoes. I am giving these shoes 4 of 5 starts because they aren't as quick drying as I thought. After a full day the sides were still wet and the inside bottom was dry. I recommended them to my friend who was wearing/carrying flip-flops. I would purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: lei10

customer_reviews.title: Fast Drying and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for an in port excursion that involved zip lining as well as cave tubing in Belize. The shoes were comfortable for walking and climbing and transitioned well in water. Once out of the water, the shoes dried remarkably fast. I didn't even notice the wetness once I was out of the water, and actually forgot that they had been wet . Great shoe. The next day I wore them out walking and my feet were not sore at the end of the day. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Eve

customer_reviews.title: Holes get small rocks stuck in them
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well and are comfortable to wear. They also do what they are meant to do as water shoes. Unfortunately, the holes at the bottom that are meant to drain water from the shoes also easily get rocks stuck in them. I have some rocks in the shoe that I tried scraping out with a pen unsuccessfully. They have been there for a year. These shoes are great for pool or water park use, but if you are planning on going to, say, an adventure park with water activities, then make sure there isn't gravel on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip to Hawaii since we were going tubing, zip-lining/hiking, and ATVing. I couldn't have made a better purchase. A lot of water shoes give absolutely no support and I needed something to keep my feet stable. I also needed a wide toe box or a roomy toe box. The shoes were inexpensive, but not cheap and provided the minimum amount of support I needed. The toe box was generous and the lacing part was comfortably snug and adjustable, which was also nice, really a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to walk along the beach and I am thrilled with them! I felt safe knowing that I would be protected from hurting my feet while walking on the sand and yet I still got the great thrill of walking in the water with them and feeling the water and all. The holes let the water drain out immediately so the sneakers remain very light. They are surprisingly supportive and grip the foot well , Bought one for me and one for the hubby and they are the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Bambs

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of swim shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were recommended to me by a friend who was wearing them in our aerobic swim class. I received these within two days of ordering and have only worn them around the house. They are very comfortable! I haven't had a chance to get into the water yet, but I feel they will work well. I was looking for shoes that were light, and the fact they have drain holes in the soles is a plus. I can't wait to try them out in the water tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Aleta Samford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, the fit, the feel! These are water shoes, not walking/hiking shoes so they don't have much for arch support but that's expected. I don't know why any normal person would think they could go hiking in water shoes. These are so comfortable and very roomy without being loose. I can't believe these fit so well without compromising comfort. I will definitely buy again when needed. I am so happy with this purchase! Can't wait to take them kayaking!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for water sports
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shoes to use in cavetubing in Belize. I was expecting rocks to maybe puncture the materials from the botom but the soles withstood the rocky/mountainous terrain 30-minutes hike up to the location prior to the activity. Pros: Dried quickly Light weight Fit well (you can easily fasten the strings on top.) Did what I expected them to do without issues or irritation.
customer_reviews.author: RandomStrangerOnTheInternet

customer_reviews.title: Buy them! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best water shoes I have tried to date! I literally researched and took days to pick another water shoe after a first fail. I was going to be near a river with lots of small & big rocks. With the extra sole on the bottom I couldn’t feel not one rock and was able to walk normally. These shoes are also true to size, whatever you wear in sneakers that’s what I would suggest. Great buy for the price! Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly light and quick drying
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these water shoes for a camping trip in which I was planning to do some river tubing and wanted more than flip-flops in which to walk on the rocky bottom of the river. When I put them on to test them out before the trip, I was amazed at how light-weight and comfortable they are! I ended up using them as tennis shoes and will be buying another pair in a different color, I like them so much. They're just funky enough to be odd, but not so see through that socks will show through them, so they can totally pass as tennis shoes. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Marina S

customer_reviews.title: ... can say about these shoes is it sometimes my great toe toenails hit on some fabric at the front ...
customer_reviews.text: The only critical thing I can say about these shoes is it sometimes my great toe toenails hit on some fabric at the front of the shoe. But they fit perfectly the laces help cinch them up a little if needed but I'm not even sure they're needed. I was able to walk in some muck in the lake bottom with very little pulling, and the advice around shaking your foot in the water to then clean them out was perfect. These shoes are fantastic
customer_reviews.author: A. Feller

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I had this style water shoe in the past and have been searching for a replacement pair since I finally had to part ways with my first pair! I wore these for the first time yesterday, and love them! They are really comfortable! I wore them as regular shoes so I can't attest to how well they stay on while in the water, but I think they will hold up really well! I usually wear size 7.5 and these fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Super cute functional watershoe
customer_reviews.text: Super cute watershoe. I had the most stylish watershoes in the park. The inside is a little slippery and can slide around in the cushion so you have to be careful if walking in creeks or in water over rocks. But it does its job and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Starting with the size, they are a perfect fit. I wear a women 10/men 8. I bought 2 pair based on the reviews. I wear these around the house and the other outside. These are great walking shoes and so far, I'm really happy I bought them. I have not worn them into water yet, but I'll update the review after I have. I'm very happy with this purchase and have recommended these to others.
customer_reviews.author: redchillismoke

customer_reviews.title: Favorite water shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Attention those going to a water park... I bought these water shoes after reading great reviews... Then we cancelled our water park trip. I kept the shoes. Finally wire them yesterday at a private island on a cruise. I LOVE THESE SHOES. Rhey feel like sneakers, are super comfortable, sand doesn't really get in them (not sure about at the beach, but we're great at the island... There were a lot of paved paths. The water doesn't get stuck in them... Other water shoes in the past made me feel like I was walking in boats if water. There is no resistance when walking inside if the water/ocean/pool. Would definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Best choice for your beach or cruise vacation
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on a cruise in and around the pools and in the ocean. Also inserted a cushioned liner for the hike over rough ground to get to a destination. Just removed it to go into the water. Should also work well in water parks. Very good protection from hot surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: DMKS

customer_reviews.title: Good but hurts
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, great fit and does the job but they rubbed my feet raw! I don’t recommend to wear these if there’s lots of walking. I wore these a couple times on day trips in Mexico. One time, all day at a natural water park-Xcaret and the other touring Chichen Itza and swimming in a Cenote. I could barely walk towards the end of both of those adventures. I kinda recommend-as long as you don’t have to walk a lot or maybe not have wide feet
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Quick drying, comfortable water shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I was confused on what size to go with as I generally wear anywhere from a size 7 to 8 (USA) and I got the 38. They are a little roomy but fits well. The cord "ties" are kinda long. When I wore them in the boat, in the lake, and then walked around hiking trails for a while, the water quickly drains right through it allowing them to dry out quickly!
customer_reviews.author: NikG

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, sporty shoes
customer_reviews.text: It fits fine and is a comfy shoe! I have not worn it yet in water but for now, I’m normally a shoe size 10-11 (it depends) and I got these shoes in a size 11 (woman). It honestly just fits where I do feel it could almost slip off if I try to fling my feet too much or something but I attempted to jog/run and it felt like it was going to slip off but didn’t. Maybe I’d go a size down. But I’m fine with it as I don’t have time to return and wait for a different shoe size!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tropical vacation with hikes to and around waterfalls.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so cute! They worked amazing for my Costa Rica vacation which included hiking to waterfalls, walking along the beach, hiking through the forest, zip lining through the trees, and swimming in the ocean. I never took them off! They kept my feet safe and dried quickly after getting wet. These were also super stylish and went with my shorts as well as swimsuit on the beach. I would recommend them before your next vacation for sure. Oh and they are super light to pack!
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Goeden

customer_reviews.title: Greatest water shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip to Cabo w/ the family. My husband liked then so much when they arrived, he rushed to but a pair of his own before the trip. They worked well & we both got lots of compliments & "where did you get those" from people. They do get small rocks stuck in the bottom & sand inside, but they aren't hard to get out. It's nice to be able to rinse them out & they dry quick. Since the trip, the husband wears his all the time like regular tennis shoes & loves them. It's been 3 months now & they have held up well!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fit great! Feet can breathe!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these water shoes! I ordered my size and they fit great. It’s a superior water shoe to other styles I’ve worn. In these, your skin can breathe (mesh sides & bottom hole drains), so even though your feet are getting wet often, the skin isn’t enclosed in moisture constantly. A few minutes out of the water and the shoes and the skin on your feet is dry again. Also, the soles provide great traction for the paddle board and steep inclines on sandy sidewalks. I can wear them while driving- versatile!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love them and I have 2 more of these for my hiking that I know that it will involve going through water. It is surprisingly comfortable, light, really cute and it dries fast. Only problem is when I walk in the sand to the beach, i will end up with the sand filled in this shoes but the great part is I can slap both sides together and all the sand fly right out quickly and easily as well
customer_reviews.author: Tossapon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I bought an 8.5 and normally wear an 8.5 and they were snug through the top of the foot but I may have been able to get away with a 8. They fit fine but a little big in the toe. I bought them for a vacation we will go on to walk in the water in rivers and lakes. But these are such great shoes to slip on. I bought the navy with the red stripe. Very sporty, very comfortable! Haven't worn them in the water yet, so we will see how they do then. But either case I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Twinfam

customer_reviews.title: A good, affordable pool water walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for water walking in the pool everyday. They are non-skid for the wet pool deck, they dry overnight, and are very light on the feet. My only quibble is that the cloth over the insole worked its way unglued and off after only a couple of weeks of daily use leaving a surface underneath that is very non-skid on my feet. Much walking on dry surfaces makes my feet burn from the friction. There isn't a lot of extra length in the sizing. If you absolutely wear the European size 42, go one size up. My toes are at the very end of the shoe. They fit, but just barely.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I go tubing down a river in the summers and often jump in and out. I also have to carry the tube up a large rocky area to get back to my car and wanted something that would drain water and still provide a barrier to allow me to walk comfortably, which traditional water shoes don't do. I love these! They're light and drain well and I can walk properly without pain.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Hulse

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOE
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING. I bought these shoes to go on a trip where we might need to walk a bit then go into water falls etc. I needed shoes that would provide some level of support and stay on my feet when walking on uneven rocks etc. These shoes will certainly do the job. They fit wonderfully! Beyond the fit they look really good. The come up around the ankle a little so they don't rub anywhere that could make them uncomfortable. These are super shoes for the price.
customer_reviews.author: e&o

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, comfort, and support
customer_reviews.text: Fit was perfect. I wear an 8.5 in Nike shoes and the 8.5 in these shoes fit the same. Better support than the typical “aqua shoe” and quite comfortable. I felt price was fair for quality of product. I met someone on my last cruise wearing these shoes on an excursion and asked where she purchased. She loved them so much I had to find them on amazon where she got them. I’m so glad I did....they exceed Speedo brand that I’ve had plus several others. I expect I will buy another pair for myself and also for my husband. Perfect for swimming in ocean and walking on the beach. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Pardo

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE! Shoes are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I really have not wore these where I bought them to use. But the material is stiff so I'm going to wear them with socks to see how they feel. They rub my heels right now. I thought I had already reviewed these shoes. Here is an update on these water shoes. I LOVE THEM! I wore these as daytime shoes often but if it rains you will get wet feet and if you play in the sand, you will get sand in your shoes. There are holes in the bottom, of course, so sand and water will get in but they are so comfortable. I would recommend them and so many compliments on them. So enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: so good!!
customer_reviews.text: I spend my entire summer on a river full of small and large rocks. THe challenge has been to find shoes that #1- don't allow rocks into your shoes and then get stuck, #2- hitting your toes on the large rocks, and #3- having enough traction not to slip on the rocks. Even though summer is not in full force, I have tried out these shoes, briefly, this spring. So far, so good!!! They are so comfortable..and easy to put on/pull off. I was hesitant to purchase multiple pairs until I tried them...now I'll be buying various colors and styles. HIGHLY RECOMMEND if you are looking for a great pair of water shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE these water shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these water shoes!! I do water aerobics 5 days a week, 2.5 hours per day and have been desperately seeking water shoes which are budget-friendly, light, quick drying, sturdy and drain quickly. These fit the bill in every category - I am so happy with them that I plan to order at least one more pair in a different color. Delivery was quick, as well. Thanks for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Pattie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes for water adventures
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were amazing on my vacation. I measured my foot and ordered per their size chart. Size 8 was a good fit even with my thin/low-volume feet. These held up swimming in the ocean multiple times, kayaking, rafting, boating, and stayed on through a gnarly mud hike through the rain forest which destroyed my boyfriends water shoes (and many other peoples, judging by the abandoned shoes on the side of the trail). They washed well and are ready for my next adventure. I figured that if they fell apart I was only out $25, but these were way beyond my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: bad monkey

customer_reviews.title: I have 4 pairs of different water shoes and these ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 pairs of different water shoes and these caught my eye because they cover the top of the foot. They are snug which I consider a "must" for a water shoe. Ordered my size: 7.5 and wore them around the house for a few hours...very comfy, very light-weight/packable and no rubbing anywhere. The sole is a type of dense foam rubber...much different than what a tennis/basketball shoe is made of. I will donate my other water shoes as these will be replacing them all.
customer_reviews.author: MyQzone

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for water activities and walking  the beach
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th brand of shoes for water aerobics I have tried and they are awesome. I bought the ones which are "closed" without needing to be laced up. I actually wore them all day after my shoes got wet when camping and they gave enough support to function as a shoe for the day. I swim with them and also walk the beach and play in surf. Bought two pairs as gifts. Highly recommend! Easy in the wallet as well.
customer_reviews.author: sherry in Pawleys Island

product_meta.title: Zhuanglin Women's Quick Drying Aqua Water Shoes Casual Walking Shoes
feature_bullets: Breathable and durable air mesh upper allow the foot to breathe
Solyte midsole provides an exceptionally lightweight midsole with excellent bounce-back and durability
Water Grip outsole provides exceptional traction in wet and slippery conditions
ComforDry sockliner provides the optimum cushioning performance that creates a cooler, drier and healthier shoe environment.
Open mesh on the upper and hole on the sole provides for superior breathability and quick drying
